data.benefits: This schemes providesÂ  maximum exposure of up to 12% of its net worth in a single project.
data.eligibility:
1.) The proposed unit seeking financial assistance must be situated within any of eight north eastern regregionsion of india.

2.) The unit should operate within Manufacturing or Service sector.
data.conditions: Only Existing and prospective entrepreneurs can apply for the scheme
data.beneficiaries: Existing and prospective entrepreneurs can apply for the scheme. All the eight North-Eastern States are eligible.
data.context: This scheme provides medium to long term financial assistance for setting up of new expansion, diversification or modernisation of projects in manufacturing or services sectors.
data.objective: It aims to provide medium to long-term financial assistance for various purposes within the manufacturing and service sectors in the north-eastern states of India.
data.description: Normally, considers maximum exposure of up to 12% of its net worth in a single project. In case of consortium lending, the total debt component in the project may be decided by the consortium partners, but corporation restricts its maximum exposure to 12% of its net worth and rest of the loan requirement may be sanctioned by other consortium partners promotes contribution should be minimum of 35-40% of the total project cost.
data.funding_facilitator: North Eastern Development Finance Corporation Limited (NEDFi)
data.funding_mechanism: Eligible applicants can apply after fulfilling of conditions under the scheme.
data.additional_info: In case of consortium lending, the total debt component in the project may be decided by the consortium partners, but corporation restricts its maximum exposure to 12% of its net worth and rest of the loan requirement may be sanctioned by other consortium partners promotes contribution should be minimum of 35-40% of the total project cost.
